body_content.explanation: extremely thin or in extremely small pieces or drops:
examples: Cut the cabbage into superfine strips with a sharp chef's knife.
I use a superfine face powder that gets rid of oily shine.
The conditions were written in super-fine print at the bottom of the page.
The needle she used was super fine so there was no pain or discomfort.

body_content.explanation: extremely good, or much much better than average:
examples: Johnny's just a super-fine young man.
Their clothes are made from superfine materials.
I'm a fan of smaller portions of super fine ingredients.
